backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing user profiles and social features including friend requests, access control, and profile storage.
feature_evidence.json: Machine-readable report linking features to associated frontend files, components, and test IDs for build tracking.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of many frontend files describing their responsibilities and key UI behaviors.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer defining app-wide CSS variables for themes, colors, and layout styling.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the root React application and main script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app container handling authentication, profile setup, room selection, dialogs, and global UI.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Auth button component integrating Internet Identity login/logout with React Query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/chat/InviteToRoo: Dialog for inviting friends to a room, showing profiles, handling adds, and supporting profile viewer dialogs.
frontend/src/components/chat/MessageComp: Provides a form to compose and send text or image messages, handling validation, preview, upload progress, and submission to a room.
frontend/src/components/chat/MessageThre: Displays a message thread with user profiles, images, autoâ€‘scrolling, and tabbed chat/voice views for a selected room.
frontend/src/components/chat/RoomList.ts: Lists available rooms and servers and includes forms to create new ones with validation, loading states, and selection handling.
frontend/src/components/friends/FriendsD: Implements a dialog for viewing friends, searching users, and sending friend requests with profile previews and loading states.
frontend/src/components/profile/FlagBadg: Empty file placeholder for a profile flag badge component.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileE: Dialog for editing a user's profile with name, bio, avatar color, and profile picture upload with preview and progress tracking.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileN: Renders a user's display name from their profile.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Initial setup dialog for creating a new user profile with name and optional bio before using the app.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileV: Dialog that loads and displays a user profile with fallbacks, showing avatar, name, bio, and picture if available.
frontend/src/components/profile/UserAvat: Renders a user avatar using a profile picture when possible, falling back to an initials-based colored avatar.
frontend/src/components/settings/Setting: Settings dialog for theme, polling interval, and alt account linking, with related mutations and validation.
frontend/src/components/voice/VoicePanel: Voice chat panel managing WebRTC session setup, mic permissions, signaling, and ICE handling for a room.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAltAccounts.ts: Hooks for querying and mutating linked alt accounts and pending requests using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useChatRooms.ts: Hooks for listing chat rooms and creating new rooms through the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useFriends.ts: Hooks for user search, fetching friends, and sending or accepting friend requests via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity auth, including loading, login, logout, and auth-client setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useRoomMembers.ts: Defines a mutation hook to add a user to a room and invalidates the rooms query on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useRoomMessages.ts: Implements hooks for fetching room messages with polling and posting new messages with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useServers.ts: Hooks for listing servers belonging to the current user and creating new servers with cache updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserPreferences.ts: Empty placeholder file for future user preference hooks.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Provides hooks to fetch and update user profiles, including caller and arbitrary users, with caching and error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useVoiceSession.ts: Exposes hooks for managing voice session state and signaling (start, end, SDP, ICE) with query invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS base with extensive light, dark, and black theme variables and custom design tokens.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering the app.
frontend/src/utils/altAccountSwitch.ts: Provides helpers for storing and retrieving an alternate-account switch intent in sessionStorage.
frontend/src/utils/flags.ts: Empty placeholder file for feature flags.
frontend/src/utils/principalDisplay.ts: Utilities for formatting principal strings into display names and initials for UI fallbacks.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and manipulating hash-based params.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, custom OKLCH color variables, typography, container settings, and plugins. Sets up dark mode, content paths, and extended color palettes for UI components.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing app goals, architectural notes, known issues, and implemented features for the TerrorChat application. Includes versioning and planning details for branding, authentication, UI themes, and user profile behavior.
